"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/532b873b636872606aeb0100#post_532b873b636872606aeb0100
[bq="Whatevs"]"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/532b83d663687207829b0000#post_532b83d663687207829b0000
she did not claw me, she cut my skin while trying to climb over me but it was to get away and not to attack
[/bq]
That's one of the reasons why you should get another person to help you when washing a cat. . also wearing pierce resistant gloves.  Zack(one of my mom's cats) used to claw people like crazy when you tried to give him a bath.


I just realized I have no life, cause I've been listening to "this song":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kdEyuLs_L5k for the last five hours.

topics.body:
This may be hilarious if true; there's rumors floating around that a anti-gay rights republican senator has a same-sex partner.

It's unconfirmed and has a high probability of being bogus, *BUT* if it's true in a couple weeks their partner is going to come out cause he's had enough of the senator cause he's abusive.

It's probably fake, *BUT* if true you better get your popcorn ready.


Side note: I still have that song stuck in my head.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/532bc0cf6368725c1ff90000#post_532bc0cf6368725c1ff90000

A politician that gets paid more to go against something while secretly enjoying it is typical hypocrisy that comes with the business.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/532bc0cf6368725c1ff90000#post_532bc0cf6368725c1ff90000
Pretty lame.
If the Reps dropped half of their social agenda their position would be very sound and persuasive.

I'm paraphrasing Penn Jillette on that 


So I've been reading doujins, and I totally understand young men on tje internet's confusion towards relationships now.
Maybe the guys in doujins have mastered game. Who knows.

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/532bc11263687253f90a0000#post_532bc11263687253f90a0000
Personally I think it *may* be true.  I'm on the fence when it comes to the chances of being true.  On the one hand it could be totally fabricated; on the other being homophobic but secretly gay totally sounds like something a senator would do.  I still remember that senator that got caught trying to flirt with a cop at a urinal then tried to act like he wasn't gay.

It's politics. This scandal will benefit a rivaling party one way or the other, fabricated or not. But they will get bonus points if it's both. They knew about hsi tendencies and set him up.

topics.body:
After playing lots and lots of New Vegas, I have decided to play Fallout 3 again.

I was going to do my typical high luck, high agility character but last time I did that, the game was too easy.

So if anyone wants, decide my spec.

topics.body: I want to spend a ton of money a really nice bike but can't justify it because of metal fatigue. Now I think I will make my own custom frame that's modular so if one tube starts to crack I can just replace that tube instead of the whole frame.

topics.body: Speaking of how you're playing fallout I realized something, they're running out of potential video game locations in the usa for another fallout.  They've already done DC and they've already done nevada and the west coast.  They obviously can never have a fallout game based in detroit cause it would just normal detroit.

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/532c80146368723ccbbb0000#post_532c80146368723ccbbb0000

Not really. They still got plenty of places going for them. They could always revisit the Midwest to confirm or re-canonize any elements from Tactics if they so wish. Or push it into Alaska (and not in simulator) and Canada.

There's more to the US than two coast lines.
